title: 1935년 Junior 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Junior. 판결일: 1935-10-15. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: May H. Junior, as etc., of Eugene D. Junior v. Julia V. Josefson, Individually and as etc., of Frank V. Josefson, and Others
**판결일**: 1935-10-15
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 246 A.D. 540

## 판결문 요약


Order dated March 11, 1935, denying motion to confirm report of official referee, and also denying application for a deficiency judgment in so far as it prays for such judgment as against Julia V. Josefson, individually and as executrix; order dated April 6, 1935, granting motion for reargument and on reargument denying motion to confirm report; and order dated May 25, 1935, denying motion to vacate the orders of March eleventh and April sixth on the ground of newly-discovered evidence and fraud, unanimously affirmed, with costs. No opinion. Present — Young, Hagarty, Carswell, Davis and Johnston, JJ.
...
